slide_lid_on_bottle.description: Slide the lid downward to tightly secure the bottle.

slide_lid_off_bottle.description: Slide the lid upward to access the bottle's content.

wiping_lid.description: Wipe the lid clean to remove any residue or dirt.

press_translation_lid.description: Press down on the lid to ensure it is securely fitted.

push_lid_on_bottle.description: Push the lid downward to secure the bottle.

pull_lid_from_bottle.description: Pull the lid upward to uncap the bottle for use.

inspect_lid.description: Rotate the lid to inspect condition.

clean_lid_surface.description: Clean the lid by wiping it.

push_inode_lid.description: Pushing in the lid of the bottle

pull_outnode_lid.description: Pulling out the lid of the bottle

clean_outer_lid.description: Wipe the exterior part of the lid to clean it

pull_lid.description: Pull the lid upward to open the bottle.

push_lid.description: Push the lid downward to close the bottle.

rotate_lid.description: Rotate the lid for some routine maintenance.

press_lid.description: Press the lid of the bottle.

clean_lid.description: Wipe the lid to clean it.

cap_bottle_lid.description: Cap the bottle by pressing the lid.

uncap_bottle_lid.description: UnCap the bottle by pressing the lid.

wipe_bottle_lid.description: Wipe the lid of the bottle to clean it.

wipe_body.description: Wipe the body of the bottle to ensure it is clean from dust and other particles.

inspect_by_rotation.description: Rotate the bottle body to inspect for any visual anomalies or imperfections.

press_for_contents_check.description: Press against the body of the bottle to check the level of its contents.

clean_bottle_surface.description: Clean the bottle body by wiping off any dust or residue.

press_bottle_body.description: Press the bottle body to check contents.

inspect_bottle.description: Rotate the bottle body for visual inspection.

clean_body.description: Wipe the bottle body to clean it

shine_bottle.description: Swipe the bottle body to make it shine.

press_body.description: Press the bottle body to check its firmness.

rotate_body.description: Rotate the bottle body for inspection.

check_bottle.description: Check the bottle by pressing and sliding out the lid.

maintain_bottle.description: Maintain the bottle by cleaning and rotating both the body and the lid.

press_bottle_lid.description: Press the lid of the bottle body.

slide_in_bottle_lid.description: Slide the lid of the bottle into the bottle body.

slide_out_bottle_lid.description: Slide the lid of the bottle out of the bottle body.

ensure_bottle_is_ready_for_use.description: Slide the lid off, wipe the bottle body, press body to check contents, and then slide lid back on.

clean_and_inspect_bottle.description: Ensure cleanliness and good condition of the bottle by wiping and rotating both the body and the lid.

prepare_bottle_for_use.description: Uncap bottle by sliding out the lid, clean lid and body, press bottle body to check contents.

secure_bottle_after_use.description: Cap the bottle by sliding in the lid after use.

open_and_clean_bottle.description: Slide out the lid and clean both the body and the lid of the bottle

close_and_check_firmness.description: Slide in the lid and press the bottle body to confirm its firmness

clean_bottle_body.description: Clean the body of the bottle to ensure it is clean and ready for use.

clean_entire_bottle.description: Clean the entire bottle including the body and lid.

cap_and_clean_bottle.description: Cap the bottle with the lid and clean it.

uncap_and_clean_bottle.description: UnCap the bottle with the lid and clean it.
